headline: Avery Dennison Corporation (AVY): Among Blue Chip Stocks to Invest in at 52-Week Lows
summary: We recently published a list of 11 Blue Chip Stocks to Invest in at 52-Week Lows. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE:AVY) stands against other blue chip stocks to invest in at 52-week lows.
